}
    console.error('Error details:', error);
} catch (error) {
            });
    await contract.approve("0xe7f1725E                from: account,
try {
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("PropertyNFT", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");

const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("Escrow", "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512")
